Package de.amr.plt.rcParkingRobot

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IAndroidHmi
    Human Machine Interface module for communication with NXT robot.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AndroidHmiPLT
    Reference implementation of Android HMI module for communication with NXT robot.
    AndroidHmiPLT.ParkSlotHandler
    Message handler for parking slot data from ReaderThread.
    AndroidHmiPLT.PositionHandler
    Message handler for position data from ReaderThread.
    AndroidHmiPLT.StatusHandler
    Message handler for status data from ReaderThread.
    BTCommunicationThread
    Thread spawned by Application main thread to handle reading and writing operations from/to bluetooth data streams.
    ConnectThread  
    IAndroidHmi.ParkingSlot
    ParkingSlot re-implementation for Android.
    IAndroidHmi.Position
    Contains all information about robot position and movement.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    IAndroidHmi.ParkingSlot.ParkingSlotStatus
    Possible states the parking slot can be in
